comment._content: Wikipedia says: Ernestine Schumann-Heink (15 June 1861 - 17 November 1936) was a well-known operatic contralto, noted for the great control, tone, beauty, and wide range of her singing. Link follows: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schumann-Heink
